summary:
A cellar for Breezehome with auto-sorting chests and crafting stations that pull from them.
Hearthfire required atleast until next update
descriptionHtml:
This adds a cellar to Breezehome that has an auto-sorting system with 22 different chests along with a complete set of crafting stations that will draw their resources from the chests. 

Hearthfire required atleast until next update
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3924910]Sjogga[/url]\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24678]Modders Resource - Auto sorting and auto looting when crafting [/url] is the only reason this exists. Apart from the menial work all credit goes to him for his excellent tutorial and scripts.

Any advice\\comments\\compliments\\ criticism is welcome
author: JamesF0790
